products.shortDescription:
With a Geek Squad® Product Replacement Plan, if your product stops working properly, we'll give you a replacement (if the product is available) or reimburse you. You'll be covered for:

Failures from normal wear and tear.Wi-Fi connectivity issues due to mechanical failure.Power surge damage, including from lightning strikes.
products.name: 2-Year Geek Squad Product Replacement

products.shortDescription:
Enhance your manufacturer warranty and get extended coverage when the warranty ends, including:

If there's a failure from normal wear and tear, we'll repair it.If your original remote control fails, we'll replace it.If your product won't work because of a power surge, we'll fix it.You won't pay for parts and labor on covered repairs.
products.name: 2-Year Standard Geek Squad Protection
